template.name: rssh_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the rssh module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for rssh client sessions. Derived types are also created for read-only and read-write file access.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: rssh_spec_domtrans_all_users
interface.summary: Transition to all user rssh domains.

interface.name: rssh_read_all_users_ro_content
interface.summary: Read all users rssh read-only content.
